document: A STUDY OF THE REAL-TIME CONTROL OF A COMPUTER-DRIVEN VEHICLE A DISSERTATION SUBMITTED TO THE DEPARTMENT OF ELECTRICAL ENGINEERING AND THE COMMITTEE ON GRADUATE STUDIES OF STANFORD UNIVERSITY IN PARTIAL FULFILLMENT OF THE REQUIREMENTS FOR THE DEGREE OF DOCTOR OF PHILOSOPHY BY Rodney Albert Schmidt, Jr. May 1971 Reproduced with permission of the copyright owner.
